dialogueTree.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Yes," she looks at you. "What is i..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yes," she looks at you. "What is it?"

links.title: You: ""I bet you liked that, didn't you?..."
links.text: "I bet you liked that, didn't you? Let's be honest, that was some first rate karaoke."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Uh... okay. Yes, that was pretty g..."
links.text: "Uh... okay. Yes, that was pretty good."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""What? No. Nonononono!" The man wit..."
links.text: "What? No. Nonononono!" The man with sunglasses shakes his head stubbornly. "There are *universal* standards of good out there and that... that was just complete shit."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Jean," she quietly interjects, giv..."
links.text: "Jean," she quietly interjects, giving you a compassionate side glance. "He's not right... treat him like you'd treat McCoy's little brother."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor John "A..."
links.text: Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor John "Archetype" McCoy's younger brother Lance McCoy, although a man of 32 years, will mentally never surpass a six year old.

links.title: You: "Wait... what? John? Lance? Who are..."
links.text: Wait... what? John? Lance? Who are these people?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "No idea. Just passing on informatio..."
links.text: No idea. Just passing on information stored in your fractured neural cortex.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: "From within your mind-haze you hear..."
links.text: From within your mind-haze you hear the end of a sentence: "...and I'm not going to pretend like he's got a *learning disability*!"

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm standing right here!""
links.text: "Hey, I'm standing right here!"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Yes, and I'm wondering why? Don't..."
links.text: "Yes, and I'm wondering why? Don't you have a case to solve?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Yes, did you want something from m..."
links.text: "Yes, did you want something from me?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not handicappable.""
links.text: "I'm not handicappable."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Now he's got a problem with learni..."
links.text: "Now he's got a problem with learning disabilities... is that supposed to be ironic?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Jean, detective." She looks at bot..."
links.text: "Jean, detective." She looks at both of you. "I don't understand what you're talking about."

links.title: You: ""Maybe it didn't go as well as I th..."
links.text: "Maybe it didn't go as well as I thought..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""You think so?""
links.text: "You think so?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""It was very nice. Different, but g..."
links.text: "It was very nice. Different, but good kind of different. I liked it."

links.title: Drama: "Sssssssshe's lying. Probably hated..."
links.text: Sssssssshe's lying. Probably hated it. They all did.

links.title: You: ""Did you hear that? Did you hear me..."
links.text: "Did you hear that? Did you hear me sing? Did you like it?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""That... that was pretty good, Harr..."
links.text: "That... that was pretty good, Harry." She pokes her companion with an elbow. "Wasn't it Jean?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Uh, that was..." He stares at you...."
links.text: "Uh, that was..." He stares at you. "Yeah, that was absolute shit -- if you want my opinion. Drunken shit. Haven't wanted anything to end this badly since I had cluster headaches."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Horrible, truly horrible," he cont..."
links.text: "Horrible, truly horrible," he continues. "I beg of you, don't ever subject anyone to this torture again. I mean seriously, you need to..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Jean..." she quietly interjects, g..."
links.text: "Jean..." she quietly interjects, giving you a compassionate side glance. "He's not right, don't make it worse and... and *I* really liked it."

links.title: Drama: "She actually *did*!"
links.text: She actually *did*!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Whoa, how does she know your name?..."
links.text: Whoa, how does she know your name? She probably heard it from somewhere. You have to be more careful, karaoke-star. Names are dangerous.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Did she just call you *Harry*? Thes..."
links.text: Did she just call you *Harry*? These people do *NOT* know you! You don't *have* a name! Ha ha!

links.title: You: ""So what Precinct are you from?""
links.text: "So what Precinct are you from?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""What *Precinct*..." She just sighs..."
links.text: "What *Precinct*..." She just sighs.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "...am I from? God, he doesn't *know..."
links.text: ...am I from? God, he doesn't *know*.

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Fucking deranged lunatic..." The s..."
links.text: "Fucking deranged lunatic..." The sunglass-wearing man pushes through his teeth.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You're getting an intellectually *u..."
links.text: You're getting an intellectually *unsatisfying* vibe from this conversation. Maybe you're doing something wrong?

links.title: You: ""Look, something is really bugging..."
links.text: "Look, something is really bugging me. Are we or are we not from the same police station?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Goddamnit, you leave her alone!" T..."
links.text: "Goddamnit, you leave her alone!" The man with sunglasses snaps at you. "Keep your weird bullshit to yourself and be professional for once, for fucks sake..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Can I actually help you with somet..."
links.text: "Can I actually help you with something?" She looks at you apologetically.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Yes, of course -- preposterous. I m..."
links.text: Yes, of course -- preposterous. I mean, you would *remember* if they were, right? Who forgets their squadmates? That's not possible.

links.title: You: ""Are you by any chance..." (Lean in..."
links.text: "Are you by any chance..." (Lean in real close.) "*working class*?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Well... raising two children and h..."
links.text: "Well... raising two children and half a husband on a patrol officer's wage. Yes, I guess I am working class."

links.title: You: ""Do you want to rise up and tear do..."
links.text: "Do you want to rise up and tear down the entire fucking system with me?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No." She sighs. "Okay. Sort of. Bu..."
links.text: "No." She sighs. "Okay. Sort of. But not with you. Like you are now. Don't take this the wrong way..."

links.title: You: ""Cool. (Give her a little wink.) I..."
links.text: "Cool. (Give her a little wink.) I am too."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Uh.... okay." Her tone doesn't sug..."
links.text: "Uh.... okay." Her tone doesn't suggest she's convinced.

links.title: Suggestion: "She's merely agreeing with you to r..."
links.text: She's merely agreeing with you to reach the conclusion of this conversation faster.

links.title: You: ""Good to know.""
links.text: "Good to know."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "She merely nods in response."
links.text: She merely nods in response.

links.title: You: ""That's nothing to be proud of.""
links.text: "That's nothing to be proud of."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Okay...""
links.text: "Okay..."

links.title: You: ""Do you work for the animal control?""
links.text: "Do you work for the animal control?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No, no I don't." It doesn't look l..."
links.text: "No, no I don't." It doesn't look like she does -- the *police* uniform she's wearing is a dead giveaway.

links.title: You: ""I'm going to venture a guess. You'..."
links.text: "I'm going to venture a guess. You're a nurse, right?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "She just looks at you and says noth..."
links.text: She just looks at you and says nothing.

links.title: You: ""Are you a nurse?""
links.text: "Are you a nurse?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Cut the crazy act," the man with s..."
links.text: "Cut the crazy act," the man with sunglasses interjects angrily. "She's being polite enough by not telling you to fuck off."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No, it's okay." She raises her eye..."
links.text: "No, it's okay." She raises her eyes to meet your gaze. "I am not. Polite. I'm just tired... was there something else you wanted?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, I wanted to address othe..."
links.text: "Actually, I wanted to address other matters."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "She nods in agreement."
links.text: She nods in agreement.

links.title: You: ""I know this might sound weird, but..."
links.text: "I know this might sound weird, but are you... a firefighter?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "Her brown eyes linger on you for a..."
links.text: Her brown eyes linger on you for a moment.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No, Harry, neither of us are firef..."
links.text: "No, Harry, neither of us are firefighters," she says with a heavy sigh, and falls silent.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Whoa, how does she know your name?..."
links.text: Whoa, how does she know your name? She probably heard it from somewhere. You have to be more careful. Names are *dangerous*.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Did she just call you *Harry*? Thes..."
links.text: Did she just call you *Harry*? These people do *NOT* know you! You don't *have* a name.

links.title: You: ""Are you with him?" (Point to the m..."
links.text: "Are you with him?" (Point to the man with sunglasses.)

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Of course I'm *with him*..." She s..."
links.text: "Of course I'm *with him*..." She seems startled by her own tone. "Why do you ask?"

links.title: You: ""Is he famous?""
links.text: "Is he famous?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""What? No. No, he's not... what are..."
links.text: "What? No. No, he's not... what are you talking about?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Actually never mind. Don't tell me..."
links.text: "Actually never mind. Don't tell me about it. It will just turn into another..." She stops mid-sentence.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whackathon? Shitshow? Pity party?"
links.text: Whackathon? Shitshow? Pity party?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Five-machine pile-on?"
links.text: Five-machine pile-on?

links.title: You: ""He's an asshole.""
links.text: "He's an asshole."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""*You're* an asshole!" He pauses. "..."
links.text: "*You're* an asshole!" He pauses. "You know what, maybe we're both assholes..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Please," she looks at you, then hi..."
links.text: "Please," she looks at you, then him, then you again. "Let's not turn this into another *exchange*, okay?"

links.title: You: ""He seems like a cool guy.""
links.text: "He seems like a cool guy."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Well, he's not." The man interject..."
links.text: "Well, he's not." The man interjects -- his voice is stern. "He's a sack of shit barely kept together by crazy glue -- but at least he tries. Unlike you."

links.title: You: ""You look cute together.""
links.text: "You look cute together."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""And you look like you don't bathe..."
links.text: "And you look like you don't bathe -- on principle," the man with sunglasses interjects.

links.title: You: ""Nothing, just wondering...""
links.text: "Nothing, just wondering..."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""The sooner you figure this hanging..."
links.text: "The sooner you figure this hanging out, the sooner everyone can go home."

links.title: You: ""Did you just call me *Harry*?""
links.text: "Did you just call me *Harry*?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Yes, I called you by your name, wh..."
links.text: "Yes, I called you by your name, what about it?" She sounds slightly agitated and... sad.

links.title: You: ""The name's Tequila. Tequila Sunset.""
links.text: "The name's Tequila. Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Honestly..." Her sad eyes scan you..."
links.text: "Honestly..." Her sad eyes scan your face, looking for signs of deceit. "I don't care. I don't think anyone does anymore."

links.title: You: ""My name is Raphaël Ambrosius Coste..."
links.text: "My name is Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau."

links.title: You: ""How do you know... my name?""
links.text: "How do you know... my name?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""God, everybody knows your name..."..."
links.text: "God, everybody knows your name..." She waves at you in a discarding motion. "Please go finish your investigation, so everyone can go home."

links.title: You: ""Is that... my name?""
links.text: "Is that... my name?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""No, Harry... it's *not* your name,..."
links.text: "No, Harry... it's *not* your name," the man scoffs. "Your name is Baron Von Kikkenberg -- cool guy."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I don't understand what this conve..."
links.text: "I don't understand what this conversation is about anymore." She's trying to look elsewhere.

links.title: Composure: "She's obviously a bit uncomfortable..."
links.text: She's obviously a bit uncomfortable in your company.

links.title: You: ""Nothing, ma'am.""
links.text: "Nothing, ma'am."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "She doesn't reply, but her eyes are..."
links.text: She doesn't reply, but her eyes are still sad.

links.title: You: ""You're the police right? Cool. So..."
links.text: "You're the police right? Cool. So am I!"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I don't..." She looks around. "I d..."
links.text: "I don't..." She looks around. "I don't know what to say."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Don't say anything, Judit.""
links.text: "Don't say anything, Judit."

links.title: You: ""Wait, is... he police?""
links.text: "Wait, is... he police?"

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Me? No. I'm just a man with sungla..."
links.text: "Me? No. I'm just a man with sunglasses. I like wearing sunglasses inside. Sunglasses -- and a *fucking wig*."

links.title: Logic: "Okay."
links.text: Okay.

links.title: You: ""What are you -- the police -- doin..."
links.text: "What are you -- the police -- doing here?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I'm just looking out for...""
links.text: "I'm just looking out for..."

links.title: Empathy: "You?"
links.text: You?

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""NO ONE!" The man looks at her. "I'..."
links.text: "NO ONE!" The man looks at her. "I'm just a man with sunglasses and you are..."

links.title: You: ""A police woman.""
links.text: "A police woman."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Yes..." Her voice is quiet. "A pol..."
links.text: "Yes..." Her voice is quiet. "A police woman who just wants to do her job, that's all," she says quietly and looks away.

links.title: Composure: "Something about the man with sungla..."
links.text: Something about the man with sunglasses and you, the energy between you two, is making her uncomfortable.

links.title: You: ""A horse-faced woman.""
links.text: "A horse-faced woman."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""You're a fucking asshole." She say..."
links.text: "You're a fucking asshole." She says this with quiet dignity. "Are we done here?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I just want to do my job, that's a..."
links.text: "I just want to do my job, that's all," she says quietly and looks away.

links.title: You: ""You have a blue uniform and mine i..."
links.text: "You have a blue uniform and mine is black... what does this mean?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Uh..." she seems confused for a mo..."
links.text: "Uh..." she seems confused for a moment. "It means I'm a patrol officer, sir."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "What was with that *sir*?"
links.text: What was with that *sir*?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "She's a woman, that's how women spe..."
links.text: She's a woman, that's how women speak to men. With respect.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No...NO... NO!!! You're a feminist,..."
links.text: No...NO... NO!!! You're a feminist, remember?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something is seriously wrong with y..."
links.text: Something is seriously wrong with you.

links.title: Authority: "It might be because you have the hi..."
links.text: It might be because you have the higher rank.

links.title: You: ""You called me *sir*. Why?""
links.text: "You called me *sir*. Why?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Well, I... uh..." She looks extrem..."
links.text: "Well, I... uh..." She looks extremely uncomfortable right now. "I guess I..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Cut the shit." The words are addre..."
links.text: "Cut the shit." The words are addressed to you. "Every second you stand here running your mouth the case grows colder."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Good-bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay. Good-bye." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Horse-Faced Woman: "The woman in an RCM patrol officer'..."
dialogueTree.text: The woman in an RCM patrol officer's uniform winces as she notices you.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I would really prefer not to talk..."
links.text: "I would really prefer not to talk to you right now..."

links.title: Authority: "As Lieutenant Kitsuragi explained,..."
links.text: As Lieutenant Kitsuragi explained, a patrol officer is the lowest rank in the RCM, below lieutenant and sergeant.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, you are a cop with the RC..."
links.text: "Hold on, you are a cop with the RCM?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Yes." She nods. "I am.""
links.text: "Yes." She nods. "I am."

links.title: You: ""I'm a cop too.""
links.text: "I'm a cop too."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I know.""
links.text: "I know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's the real deal, he has a badge.""
links.text: "He's the real deal, he has a badge."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's hard to tell whether he's sarc..."
links.text: It's hard to tell whether he's sarcastic or sincere, but if you had to guess you would say the lieutenant is being sarcastic.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's the real deal, he has a gun n..."
links.text: "He's the real deal, he has a gun now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's the real deal.""
links.text: "He's the real deal."

links.title: You: ""I'm on a murder investigation. Are..."
links.text: "I'm on a murder investigation. Are you the cavalry?"

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I'm definitely not the cavalry.""
links.text: "I'm definitely not the cavalry."

links.title: You: ""Is everything alright? Why don't y..."
links.text: "Is everything alright? Why don't you want to talk to me?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""I don't know..." She's still avoid..."
links.text: "I don't know..." She's still avoiding your gaze. "I mean, why would I want to talk to you?"

links.title: Suggestion: "...after all you've done -- is what..."
links.text: ...after all you've done -- is what her tone implies.

links.title: You: ""Have I wronged you? I've done that..."
links.text: "Have I wronged you? I've done that to a lot of people."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No, you haven't wronged me. It's o..."
links.text: "No, you haven't wronged me. It's okay." She shakes her head and breathes out.

links.title: Empathy: "Something changes in her. It's pity..."
links.text: Something changes in her. It's pity. Pity comes over her.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Okay, fine. Let's talk. What did y..."
links.text: "Okay, fine. Let's talk. What did you want?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Hmm... what does one talk about wit..."
links.text: Hmm... what does one talk about with a fellow officer?

links.title: You: ""It's cool to see another cop. I th..."
links.text: "It's cool to see another cop. I thought Kim and I were the only ones."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""No you're not, you're not the only..."
links.text: "No you're not, you're not the only cop in the world." She shakes her head and breathes out.

links.title: You: ""God... I don't know why, I'm just..."
links.text: "God... I don't know why, I'm just trying to do my best..."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""But you're not trying your best, a..."
links.text: "But you're not trying your best, are you?" He says with a flash of anger.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Calm down," she says to the man, t..."
links.text: "Calm down," she says to the man, then turns to you.

links.title: You: ""I'm a deeply flawed individual, bu..."
links.text: "I'm a deeply flawed individual, but I bring joy to the world."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Do you now?" she asks, narrowing h..."
links.text: "Do you now?" she asks, narrowing her eyes. After a moment she shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""Let's just do this by the book, ok..."
links.text: "Let's just do this by the book, okay."

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""By the...?" She pinches the root o..."
links.text: "By the...?" She pinches the root of her nose.

links.title: You: ""Why?! I bring word of *the End to..."
links.text: "Why?! I bring word of *the End to come*."

links.title: Man with Sunglasses: ""Of course he does..." The man at t..."
links.text: "Of course he does..." The man at the table says to himself.

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Word of the End to come..." She sh..."
links.text: "Word of the End to come..." She shakes her head, tired.

links.title: Empathy: "Then something changes in her. It's..."
links.text: Then something changes in her. It's pity. Pity comes over her.

links.title: You: ""Fine, I'm leaving." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Fine, I'm leaving." [Leave.]

links.title: Horse-Faced Woman: ""Okay." It looks like she's about t..."
links.text: "Okay." It looks like she's about to add something, but then she changes her mind.

links.title: Authority: "A patrol officer is the lowest rank..."
links.text: A patrol officer is the lowest rank in the RCM, below lieutenant and sergeant.
